name: The Creature (SuperGobo)
description:
Welcome to The Creature, a game created over the course of 5 days for the Week Sauce game jam! After a mining robot’s battery pack is damaged in the mines, a helpful creature comes along to help using its natural electric charge. Help them work together to get the robot back home!

Tip: press F11 to toggle fullscreen mode and enjoy a more immersive experience!
